sentences.english: Let's look at the following meaning attached by the monarchy will aid fringe patterns of behavior in public life.
sentences.chinese: 下面再來看君主援經義附會緣飾政事的行爲模式。

sentences.english: Zhou gong was very diligent at government matters when assisting young King Cheng. He tried to attract talents widely.
sentences.chinese: 周公輔佐年幼的成王時，勤於政事，廣泛招攬人才。

sentences.english: We will reform the management system of institutions in accordance with the principle of separating the functions of government from those of institutions.
sentences.chinese: 按照政事分開原則，改革事業單位管理體制。

sentences.english: I would prefer a situation in which we had a genuinely apolitical military.
sentences.chinese: 我更喜歡的是一個真正不問政事的軍隊。

sentences.english: Lists rejected civil service position requests.
sentences.chinese: 列出拒絕的行政事務職位請求。

sentences.english: He fully oversees the church administration and faithfully transcribes the Bible Overview Message for every Discipleship Training session.
sentences.chinese: 他負責教會的行政事務以及預備門徒培訓信息的抄本。

sentences.english: We should gradually separate their judicial adjudication and procuratorial work from their administrative affairs.
sentences.chinese: 逐步實現司法審判和檢察同司法行政事務相分離。

sentences.english: He does not sit down upon the throne in empty state, or hold a sceptre without wielding it in government.
sentences.chinese: 祂並非空自坐在寶座上，或是持節而不理政事。

sentences.english: The establishment of a permanent secretariat to deal with day-to-day administrative matters.
sentences.chinese: 建立一個常設的祕書處處理日常行政事務。

sentences.english: Adminstration of all Company Policies and Practices.
sentences.chinese: 負責公司的辦公秩序及行政事務管理。
協助處理公司行政事務。

sentences.english: The charging fee is subject to change with the approval from Executive Committee of Administrative Affairs (ECAA).
sentences.chinese: 無線上網費用若需調整須通過行政事務委員會審覈。

sentences.english: Augustus instituted boards of curators to take charge of administrative tasks.
sentences.chinese: 奧古斯都曾設立保佐人委員會負責行政事務。

sentences.english: Be responsible for other daily admin affairs.
sentences.chinese: 負責公司其他日常行政事務。

sentences.english: Qingli three years. Canzhizhengshi, the proposed political reform.
sentences.chinese: 慶曆三年，任參知政事，建議改革政治。

definition: national politics/archaic rank, "Minister of State"/common given name
to hold a court audience/to govern from the imperial throne (applies esp. to Empress Dowager or Regent)
style of governing (of minor official)/achievement in office
